name: World Strategy War
description:
You have a very different strategy game before you. This game is designed for those who like turn based games. Turn-based games are generally not playable online. But this game can also be played online.

You can start the game by choosing one of the different races. You can choose races such as Dwarves, Elves, Humans. You will have one king and many princes in the game. Going to wars with kings and/or princes will give you an advantage.

You need to constantly develop your city. Your main income is the taxes you collect from the people.

Good games.
